name: Quester
storyline:
A Story Exploring the Truth of a Lost World

Year 20XX.
Viruses harmful to human bodies spread from a certain country. As if in agreement, natural disasters occurred in various places. The world can no longer sustain civilization.

The air is dirty, the water stagnates, "Aptitude" became necessary even to live.

From underground, the creepy creatures begin to crawl.

People lose most of it.

Under the torn sky, to live, we dived into the ruins of civilizationthe - the dungeon, "Explore" something.

What is a Quester?
A handful of people who survive such an abandoned world.
summary: Quester is a role-playing game for PC, released by Thousand Games on 2023. Kazushi Hagiwara was deeply involved in the production and based on his suggestions, it was produced by Thousand Games. It's an indie game and includes hack and slash.
